item.description:
So, you weren't one of the chosen, huh?  Come down and wash away your worries at the Armsby Abbey with the others that were "left behind".  We're shooting for 1:00pm,  but might be a few minutes late.  Have a drink while you wait.  

We will be meeting at Armsby Abby during stART on the street for some drinks, conversation, and browsing local artist booths. Streets will be closed in the area, but ample parking is easily found nearby. Come join us to soak in Worcester life.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a group of people and say the secret word... Hello
item.name: Rapture Over? Still Here? So's everyone else. Come Have a Drink at stART
